subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Larry Sanders, the N.B.A’s leader in blocked shots, shares with Tyson Chandler of the Knicks the ability to guard on the perimeter and then rush back to defend at the basket.
snippet: Larry Sanders, the N.B.A’s leader in blocked shots, shares with Tyson Chandler of the Knicks the ability to guard on the perimeter and then rush back to defend at the basket.
